title: Riot Pls where is my honor and rewards at?
body: I was suspended over a month ago for being toxic. But about a week or two after being unbanned, I was notified I would start receiving honor level progress, and rewards such as key fragments. But since then , i still haven't gotten any rewards, or any honor progress since the notification, even after being honored many times. Please help, I want my rewards back. I am reformed.

replies.body: This is true he has been very nice and reformed in all of our recent games and he should definitely get his rewards for being a nice summoner {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

After getting punished your Honor level was dropped to rank 0. Since key fragments are tied to the Honor system now, you won't be seeing fragment drops until your honor rank climbs back into the honorable territory.

the reason why get no rewards is very simple: you are lv 0/lv 1 I guess thats the reason why got no rewards or less than other players.
about the question why you odn't lv up, lv up is a long process that afects through different aspects like, sorted by how much they impact the process
 bans and punishments
games played
honors get
It takes a while for you to level up your honor. It took me about two months just to get Honor 3 playing a few games a day.
